name: City Bus Inc.
description:
Thinking about starting your own business and becoming your own boss? Why not become an bus station tycoon? Build your bus station and start transporting passengers.

Start with a small station and turn it into a major bus management business. To increase your earnings upgrade the speed, bus capacity and ticket price.

Make your business grow!

Take care of your passengers and offer them the best transportation experience. Upgrade the bus station facilities and services to create the most popular bu station in the world!

If you like idle and tapping games, you will enjoy this casual bus management game. City Bus Inc. is an easy-to-play game where you run your own business with different product departments.

Make important management decisions to build your empire and transform your small bus station into one of the greatest in the world! You can also sell your bus station and start over with all your previously acquired management experience, which will help you earn more money with your new station.

Features:

- Casual and easy gameplay
- Constant challenges suitable for any player at any level
- Different types of busses, stations and cities
- Fabulous 3D graphics and awesome animations
- Make important managing decisions to expand your business
- Save your progress in the cloud and recover it if you change your device
